name: UN Sustainable Development Goals - Selected Targets

targets.targetText: By 2030, ensure equal access for all women and men to affordable and quality technical, vocational and tertiary education, including university

indicators.description: Participation rate of youth and adults in formal and non-formal education and training in the previous 12 months, by sex

targets.targetText: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

indicators.description: Proportion of youth and adults with information and communications technology (ICT) skills, by type of skill

targets.targetText: End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere

indicators.description: Whether or not legal frameworks are in place to promote, enforce and monitor equality and nonâ€‘discrimination on the basis of sex

targets.targetText: Ensure women's full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life

indicators.description: Proportion of women in managerial positions

targets.targetText: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation

indicators.description: Annual growth rate of real GDP per employed person

targets.targetText: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

indicators.description: Average hourly earnings of female and male employees, by occupation, age and persons with disabilities
Unemployment rate, by sex, age and persons with disabilities

targets.targetText: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers

indicators.description: Fatal and non-fatal occupational injuries per 100,000 workers, by sex and migrant status

targets.targetText: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

indicators.description: Proportion of people living below 50 per cent of median income, by sex, age and persons with disabilities

targets.targetText: Ensure equal opportunity and reduce inequalities of outcome, including by eliminating discriminatory laws, policies and practices

indicators.description: Proportion of population reporting having personally felt discriminated against or harassed in the previous 12 months

targets.targetText: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

indicators.description: Number of countries that have communicated strengthening of institutional, systemic and individual capacity-building

targets.targetText: Improve education, awareness-raising and human and institutional capacity on climate change mitigation, adaptation, impact reduction and early warning

indicators.description: Number of countries that have integrated mitigation, adaptation, impact reduction and early warning into primary, secondary and tertiary curricula

targets.targetText: Encourage and promote effective public, public-private and civil society partnerships

indicators.description: Amount of United States dollars committed to public-private and civil society partnerships
